excerpt.rendered:
This light workboat 540 is based on the well-known Bullit 540. The tender boat is 5.40m long and 2.00m wide. The draft is 0.20m and the headroom 1.15kg. The hull weight is 520kg. The workboat 540 is characterised by its excellent sailing properties, stability and compact comfort. This workboat can serve perfectly as a fireboat, surveillance boat or workboat with a push block and can reach high speeds. The Workboat 540 is low-maintenance, they can remain in the water during the winter and can freeze if necessary. Above all, aluminium is foolproof, because it cannot be broken.

The Workboat 540 can be delivered with an outboard or an inboard engine.

View the other Bullit workboats here >>
